forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 22. Southwest wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 39. Southwest wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As night unfurls its blanket over Boston, the city lies quietly enveloped in a tapestry of twinkling lights. Down below, the streets exude a sense of calm, with the cool air brushing against your cheeks, inviting you to stroll while wrapped in a warm layer. With a low anticipated around 22 degrees, it’s wise to don something cozy—a thick sweater draped beneath a well-worn jacket, perhaps, accompanied by a soft scarf to fend off the evening chill. Although the gusty winds hint at a touch of audacity, they carry with them the fresh promise of tomorrow.

The dawn will break with a generous embrace of sunshine, igniting the skies with warmth as the day unfolds. Under the watchful eye of a predominantly clear blue expanse, the temperature will nudge up towards a modest 39 degrees. Expect a wise play of the winds, swirling between 8 to 16 mph, offering a dance that adds a certain briskness to your walk. As you venture outside, consider a leisurely stroll along the Charles River or perhaps a visit to one of the many local cafés, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles with idle chatter, creating a charming retreat from the chill. While the surroundings are likely to be pleasant, the distinction between comfortable warmth and the insistent bite of winter will guide your attire choices today. It is an ideal time to enjoy the quiet simplicities of the city, capturing moments that will linger long after the sun dips below the horizon again.
